entry.source: {F804,5}{F873,1}{F804,0} has escaped into this world of chaos. He{F801}is a natural-born liar, and causes all kinds of{F801}pandemonium. We must capture him quickly,{F801}otherwise his evil plans may throw the world{F801}into further disarray. Child of man, you must{F801}defeat him so he can be captured! He may have{F801}run to a city called {F804,5}Shibuya.{F804,0}{F801}
